title: 🦺 "I had chosen to use my work as a reflection of my values." - Sidney Poitier
content:
is sponsored by Sourcegraph! Given a string s, you can transform every letter individually to be lowercase or uppercase. Return a list of all possible permutations you could create from s.

Example:

$ capPermutations("ab2")
$ ["ab2","aB2","Ab2","AB2"]

$ capPermutations("35p")
$ ["35p","35P"]
